contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 13th day of January 2000, the petition for allowance of appeal is GRANTED and the case is REMANDED to the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County to rule on the petitioners’ post-trial motions for remittitur and to rule on the issues concerning evidentiary rulings and the allegedly prejudicial remarks.
Justice NIGRO did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
